name: Dougzilla
description:
Dougzilla - Ludum Dare 33 - You Are The Monster!

10mb download to browser

  • left/right arrow keys - move left/right
  • up/down arrow keys - move target
  • spacebar - shoot at target
  • esc key - back to menu
  • press any key on menu to advance
click mouse on the screen if controls not working!
